pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mini-XML is a small XML parsing library that you can use to read XML data files or strings in your application without requiring large non-standard libraries. Mini-XML provides the following functionality: - Reading of UTF-8 and UTF-16 and writing of UTF-8 encoded XML files and strings. - Data is stored in a linked-list tree structure, preserving the XML data hierarchy. - SAX (streamed) reading of XML files and strings to minimize memory usage. - Supports arbitrary element names, attributes, and attribute values with no preset limits, just available memory. - Supports integer, real, opaque ("cdata"), and text data types in "leaf" nodes. - Functions for creating and managing trees of data. - Find" and "walk" functions for easily locating and navigating trees of data. Mini-XML doesn't do validation or other types of processing on the data based upon schema files or other sources of definition information.
